cn.title: 关于比特派停用备用域名的公告

message.data: 比特派备用域名 piepiewallet.com, bitpiecn.com, bitpiehk.com, bitpieasia.com, bitpie.one 将于2022年9月1日停止使用，请勿再通过以上域名进行比特派软件的下载与安装。
后续请所有用户认准比特派唯一官网 https://bitpie.com

en.title: Announcement on Alternative Domain Names Deactivation

message.data: Bitpie alternative domain names piepiewallet.com, bitpiecn.com, bitpiehk.com, bitpieasia.com, bitpie.one will be discontinued on September 1, 2022. Please do not download and install Bitpie wallet through the above domain names.
https://bitpie.com is the only official website in the future.
